metadata.purpose: Function registry for StackTrackr agentic operating system
metadata.description: Centralized memory for all functions, dependencies, and requirements to accelerate troubleshooting and development

functions.name: renderTable
functions.description: Primary table rendering function that handles filtering, sorting, and pagination
functions.performance_notes: Uses monitorPerformance wrapper and DocumentFragment for optimized rendering

functions.name: filterInventory
functions.description: Filters inventory based on search query and active column filters
functions.performance_notes: Uses debouncing for search input handling

functions.name: filterInventoryAdvanced
functions.description: Enhanced filtering system with support for complex criteria and multiple filter types
functions.performance_notes: Optimized for handling multiple concurrent filters

functions.name: clearAllFilters
functions.description: Resets all active filters and search criteria

ui.description: User interface and DOM manipulation functions

functions.name: showFilesModal
functions.description: Shows the files modal with proper body overflow management
functions.notes: Updated to include body overflow management and global modal system integration

functions.name: hideFilesModal
functions.description: Hides the files modal and restores body overflow
functions.notes: Updated to include body overflow restoration and error handling

functions.name: renderActiveFilters
functions.description: Renders active filter chips beneath the search bar
functions.performance_notes: Updates filter chip container based on current filters and inventory state

functions.name: setupColumnResizing
functions.description: Initializes column resizing functionality for the inventory table

functions.name: setupResponsiveColumns
functions.description: Sets up responsive column behavior based on viewport size
functions.performance_notes: Uses ResizeObserver for efficient viewport monitoring

validation.description: Data validation and error handling functions

function.name: string - Function name
function.file: string - File path relative to project root
function.line: number - Line number where function is defined
function.description: string - Brief description of function purpose
function.side_effects: array - Any side effects (DOM changes, storage, etc.)
function.last_modified: string - ISO date of last modification
function.modified_by: string - Agent that last modified the function

dependency.name: string - Library/module name
dependency.purpose: string - Why this dependency is needed
dependency.alternatives: array - Alternative libraries that could be used

export.description: Data export functionality for inventory management

functions.name: exportCsv
functions.description: Exports current inventory data as CSV file with comprehensive formatting
functions.notes: Created to resolve missing function error preventing app load

functions.name: exportJson
functions.description: Exports complete inventory data as JSON file with all metadata
functions.notes: Created to resolve missing function error preventing app load

functions.name: exportPdf
functions.description: Exports inventory as printable PDF using browser print dialog
functions.returns: void - opens print dialog in new window
functions.notes: Created to resolve missing function error preventing app load

instructions.for_agents: When adding, modifying, or removing functions, always update this file with complete information including dependencies and requirements. This helps accelerate troubleshooting and prevents conflicts.
instructions.function_tracking: Every function change must be logged here with file location, dependencies, and any special requirements
instructions.dependency_management: Track all external libraries and internal module dependencies to prevent version conflicts
instructions.performance_tracking: Note performance implications of functions to help with optimization tasks
